# isEmpty

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the path is empty.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the path contains no elements, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it contains at least one element.

## Querying a Path

- **bounds**: The bounding box of the path.
- **controlPointBounds**: The bounding box of the path, including any control points.
- **currentPoint**: The current point (the trailing point or ending point in the most recently added segment).
